short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect videos from your favorite websites to watch on your mobile device computer or TV. Powered by Rovi (http://www.stash.it)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stash is a new, free web service that lets you collect videos from around the web by 'stashing' them into a personal video library, create and share video playlists, and access your 'Stash' on the go with mobile devices like an iPhone, iPad and Android phones or tablets.
